title: Hero's Torch
description: Fear and faith are indivisible on the Republic of Earth. Privacy is nonexistent, creativity is a crime, and intelligence is a heresy. Leander Schaiden has spent his young life in a battle against the Church, seeking any freedom he can steal. The Septarch is immortal and all-powerful, far beyond the control of the Republic. Leander considers him a tale told to frighten children. Leander is wrong.Words: 107,190 complete
